Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good news, <MYNAME>! A new resident has
moved into town.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've brought her here to introduce her
to you. You can come inside now!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKOWN>Hi there, <MYNAME>. You're the one who
built my home?
<PAGE>
It's totally wonderful. I love it!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKOWN>Sorry, of course. You don't even know
who I am! My name's <BLUE>Tina</BLUE>. I work in
deliveries and reporting too!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>I'll do whatever it takes to get the
scoop, so if you have some info just let
me know!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
I've just got a feeling that something
is going to happen in this town. Quite
likely centered around you!
<PAGE>
My hunches are always on the money. I
can't wait to see what's going to happen
here!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That takes care of the self
introductions. 
<PAGE>
I've delivered the newspapers up until
now, but Tina is going to take over
those duties.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Delivering the newspapers will give me a
chance to research articles! Perfect,
and I get paid for it too!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's all we wanted to say, anyway.
Sorry for coming by so early in the
morning. Keep up the good work!

A new person has come to the town! Let's
hope we become good friends!
